content: pattern you may print out this pattern for your own personal use but you cannot distribute it whether for free or for sale in any form through any venue including but not limited to photocopying other electrical or mechanical means recording or any other information storage and/or retrieval system without prior written consent of the designer you may sell your finished project as long as it is not being mass produced if posting a picture online or in any advertising form of your project credit to on hooks and needles http //on-hooks-and-needles blogspot com would be appreciated all violations of this copyright are punishable by law including fines and/or imprisonment
